entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Huntsville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:47 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -4.5°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
